com.bazaarvoice
Class SubmissionParams

java.lang.Object
  com.bazaarvoice.BazaarParams
      com.bazaarvoice.SubmissionParams

public class SubmissionParams
extends BazaarParams

Handles the parameters for content submission.
Use of this class will rely on knowledge of the Bazaarvoice API. You should use this site as a reference for which parameters to pass using this class.

Method Detail

getAction

public Action getAction()
Get the Action type for the "Action" parameter for this submission if it has been set.

Returns:
the action type

setAction

public void setAction(Action action)
The submission action to take -- either Preview or Submit. Preview will result in a draft of the content to be submitted; Submit will submit the content.

Parameters:
action - an action type

getAgreedToTermsAndConditions

Returns:
the value

setAgreedToTermsAndConditions

public void setAgreedToTermsAndConditions(boolean agreedToTermsAndConditions)
Boolean indicating whether or not the user agreed to the terms and conditions. Required depending on the client's settings.

Parameters:
agreedToTermsAndConditions - true for yes, false for no

Arbitrary text that may be saved alongside content to indicate vehicle by which content was captured, e.g. “post-purchase email”.

Parameters:
campaignId - a campaign id

Locale to display Labels, Configuration, Product Attributes and Category Attributes in. The default value is the locale defined in the display associated with the API key.

Parameters:
locale - a locale

addContextDataValue

public void addContextDataValue(java.lang.String dimensionExternalId,
                                java.lang.String value)
Sets ContextDataValue for a particular dimensionExternalId. In general, this parameter is used for custom parameters that a client may want to track. Some examples of this parameter include the following: - dimensionExternalId:PurchaserRank value:"top10" -> ContextDataValue_PurchaserRank=top10 - dimensionExternalId:Purchaser value:"yes" -> ContextDataValue_Purchaser=yes - dimensionExternalId:Age value:"35to44" -> ContextDataValue_Age=35to44 - dimensionExternalId:Gender value:"male" -> ContextDataValue_Gender=male

Parameters:
dimensionExternalId - the dimensionExternalId of the context data value
value - a parameter value

getContextDataValue

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getContextDataValue()

addPhotoCaption

public void addPhotoCaption(java.lang.String photoCaption)
Associates a photo caption with this submission.

Usage:
For each photo added, the caption must be added in the same order. i.e.

addPhotoUrl(photo1);
addPhotoUrl(photo2);
addPhotoCaption(captionfor1);
addPhotoCaption(captionfor2);

Parameters:
photoCaption - a photo caption

getPhotoCaptions

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPhotoCaptions()

addPhotoUrl

public void addPhotoUrl(java.lang.String photoUrl)
Associates a photo url with this submission.

Parameters:
photoUrl - the url of a photo hosted by Bazaarvoice (uploaded though the API)

getPhotoUrls

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPhotoUrls()

addVideoCaption

public void addVideoCaption(java.lang.String videoCaption)
Associates a video caption with this submission.

Usage:
For each video added, the caption must be added in the same order. i.e.

addVideoUrl(video1);
addVideoUrl(video2);
addVideoCaption(captionfor1);
addVideoCaption(captionfor2);

Parameters:
videoCaption - a video caption

Associates a video url with this submission.

Parameters:
videoUrl - the url of a video hosted by either YouTube or Bazaarvoice (Uploaded through the API)

getVideoUrls

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getVideoUrls()

addAdditionalField

public void addAdditionalField(java.lang.String id,
                               java.lang.String value)
Sets AdditionalField for a particular dimensionExternalId. In general, this parameter is used to attach additional information to a submission. A concrete example of the parameter might be a dimensionExternalId of'Seat' with a value of '24F' (describing the seat number at a stadium or on a plane) resulting in a parameter AdditionalField_Seat=24F.

Parameters:
id - the id of the additional field
value - a value

getAdditionalField

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAdditionalField()

the product id

Parameters:
productId -

addTagForDimensionExternalId

public void addTagForDimensionExternalId(java.lang.String dimensionExternalId,
                                         java.lang.String value)
Adds a tag with a particular dimensionExternalId and value. For example, a client might add the value "comfort" for the dimensionExternalId of "Pro" and "expensive" with a dimensionExternalId of "Con."

Parameters:
dimensionExternalId - dimension external id for this tag
value - tag value.

getTagForDimensionExternalId

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getTagForDimensionExternalId()

addTagIdForDimensionExternalId

public void addTagIdForDimensionExternalId(java.lang.String dimensionExternalId,
                                           java.lang.Boolean value)
Adds a tag with a particular dimensionExternalId and value. For example, a client might add the value "comfort" for the dimensionExternalId of "Pro" and "expensive" with a dimensionExternalId of "Con."

Parameters:
dimensionExternalId - dimension external id for this tag
value - tag value.

addRatingForDimensionExternalId

public void addRatingForDimensionExternalId(java.lang.String dimensionExternalId,
                                            java.lang.String value)
Sets a rating for a particular dimensionExternalId. A concrete example might be a dimensionExternalId of "Quality" where the value would represent the user's opinion of the quality of the product.

Parameters:
dimensionExternalId - the dimension id
value - a rating
